items.item_details:
Amended: Approval to accept the Bond Project Specialty Contractor Pre-Qualification Criteria and Procedures for Track and Turf Construction Projects for Andrew Hill, Piedmont Hills, and Santa Teresa High Schools with the following schools Track and/or Turf projects to be phased over the following months:
Andrew Hill           $875,000.          Grant          10/02
Piedmont Hills     $200,000.          Donation     3/03 & 5/03
Santa Teresa-site conditions                             12/02
Oak Grove, James Lick and Yerba Buena       2/12/04
Independence, Silver Creek, Mt. Pleasant, and WC Overfelt - open
